name: Exotic Sunset. One-off Piece.
description: Be the breathtaking blossom amongst the common flowers in the ‘Henriet’ gown. Designed to have a stunning appearance and flow when both walking and standing still. Fall in love with its luxurious feel and shape as you would fall in love with Spring. A Sophisticated and absolutely divine style that will make you feel like an exotic jewel. All that you need to wear with this piece is a pair of heels. This 'Exotic Sunset' Henriet piece will make you the most eye-catching beauty at your formal, at the races and basically anywhere you wear it. Made with hand-dyed silk habutai and shantung in the most amazingly rich blend of exotic colours. A truly unique piece that you will never find in any corner of the planet. This dress is a once only piece and will never be re-made in these colours, making sure you remain absolutely unique :) The skirt features a stunning flounced/gathered overlay that dances in the wind! Scoops to one side and wraps around to the back, with plenty of fullness. The straps can sit either softly on the shoulders, draped over the shoulders or you can have one strap hanging by the waist with the other over the shoulder. It's completely up to you how you like to place them! Measurement Details: Australian size 10. will fit bust measurement: 84-90cm (around 88cm would be best fitted. for around 84cm, wearing a gel stick-on bra is advisable) waist:67-72cm (67cm ideal) hips: max width-107cm.. the skirt is flowy at the hips so any size under 107cm is fine. Length of skirt from side waist: 100cm Bodice is lined with silk shantung and supported with 5mm spiral steel boning. Skirt is lined with knee-length magenta stretch knit. For more images please visit www.facebook.com/ZarBe and look in the 'current collection' album.

name: The Red Lady. Limited Edition
description: Brand New Style! Very Classy, sophisticated, elegant and timeless. Made from luxurious, rich, red satin. You will most surely make a powerful impression with this amazing piece. Features a one shoulder strap. Bodice supported with 5mm Spiral metal boning. Lined with red cotton, Skirt supported with tulle. Made to order in sizes 8, 10 and 12. Limited Availability. Will only make 5 of this colour. NOTE: 35% discount only applies to size 8. Other sizes will be made to order after 1st Jan 2011

name: Victoria in Sky Blue
description:
'Rays of the afternoon sun glisten over a courtyard of lush greenery and rich colours. Sculptured hedges sweep around garden beds of tulips, lilies and roses. Ancient Greek statues come to life at the touch of the sun’s golden fingers as a whispering wind travels through the courtyard, making droplets from the water fountain dance softly upon the skin of a delicate, blonde woman. '

The ‘Victoria’ dress is an elegant and classy piece, perfect for afternoon soirees, dinner parties, the races, costumed events and functions. Looks divine with pearls, curls, diamonds, gloves, stockings, white heels, lace fan or parasol, vintage bolero or feather hair accessories. 

Very limited and unique, vintage style design with contemporary flair. Made from 100%cotton fabric and lace. Only 6 available!
Fitted dress featuring a pleated peplum for a 'bustle' look. Bodice sits just below waist and is boned using 5mm spiral steel boning that will retain its strength and flexibility without warping or staying in a bent position (unlike plastic boning). Invisible side zipper closure. Made to order in Australian size 8,10 or 12. Please allow a maximum of 2 weeks after payment clears to receive your dress :)


ZarBe’s Signature Styles inspires you to take hold of everything you’ve ever wished to feel! Delve deeper into the characters behind each signature style by reading their unique story on the website - www.zarbe.com.au

name: Spearmint SIlk Adriana. Limited Edition
description:
Limited Edition Hand-dyed silk 'Adriana'.

Made with silk shantung in the most luscious spearmint colour, contrasted with black silk shantung 'curls'. 
Eye-catching design featuring one shoulder strap, fitted bodice, daring 'curls' and bubbled skirt.

Lined with black cotton. Bodice supported with 5mm spiral steel boning. Skirt supported with tulle. Invisible side zipper closure.

Made to order in sizes 8, 10 and 12. Only 4 will be made of this colour.
